original_text: This book tells about Hilkiah's son, Jeremiah, and the words that he spoke. Jeremiah was a priest. He lived at Anathoth, a town in the land that belonged to the tribe of Benjamin.
korean_text: 베냐민 땅 아나돗의 제사장들 중 힐기야의 아들 예레미야의 말이라

sentences.original_text: This book tells about Hilkiah's son, Jeremiah
sentences.korean_translation: 이 책은 힐기야의 아들 예레미야에 대해 말합니다

sentences.original_text: and the words that he spoke
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 말한 말씀들에 대해 말합니다

sentences.original_text: a town in the land that belonged to the tribe of Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 베냐민 지파에게 속한 땅에 있는 도시였습니다
